value:
Seems it's past time that I start my
daily training. If I slack off, somebody
will scold me—I just know it.

I like to keep my feet firmly planted
on the ground. But the view from
this guy's back is nice, too...$k$pFeel that breeze!

What's on your mind? You have that
look about you...$k$pHow about a race to that hill over
there? Fresh air always helps me
blow away the cobwebs.

Hm? This apple? Well...I was going to
give it to my buddy here, but it looked
so good...$k$pWant a bite? Go ahead, don't be shy!

If it isn't $Nu!
I'm grooming my horse. Go ahead and
pet him! He won't bite.

So this is your castle, is it,
$Nu?$k$pIt's just as impressive as
$Nf's is.

We will tame the chaos. Gather
under my banner!

I vow here and now to set my
sights on grander heights!

That's it? Really? Well, it's
probably my fault. Sorry!

On my honor, this power will
become your strength, too!

I'm Chrom, prince of the Halidom of
Ylisse. That look on your face... Rest
easy! I know how to handle a horse.

I've got a question for you. When
somebody says "knight," what does
that mean to you?$k$pSomeone noble—someone who
would sacrifice themselves for
their allies. Hmm...$k$pA warrior who battles with pride and
who doesn't flinch in the face of
battle? I see.$k$pSo, that's not quite how I think about
things...$k$pThe willingness to sacrifice yourself to
save someone else is admirable,
certainly. Not everyone can do that.$k$pBut think about it... If you sacrifice
yourself, you'll end up hurting the
people who care about you. Right?$k$pYeah, you got me. I'm talking about
you, $Nu.$k$pYou face some hard decisions. If you
want to protect others, you'd better
protect yourself first.$k$pWe can help each other. Let's talk
about our hardships and share our
ideals...$k$pWe're comrades, now. That bond
can't be broken—ever!
はぁっ！
むんっ！
うああっ！
しまった…！
I'm being helpful!
Charging on ahead!
I can't stop this thing!
Horse and man as one!
I'm sorry...everyone...
はははっ
Don't worry. I took a lesson on mounted combat a few years ago.
Did you call for me?
Mobility is one of the many strengths of being on horseback. If your friends need help, you can reach them in an instant.
If you want to learn how to make friends with a horse, just ask Frederick. His best friend is a horse!
Mastering different combat styles is sure to make me stronger.
Now that I've been charging around on horseback, the amount of training dummies I've been able to break has increased nearly tenfold...
If you're ever in trouble, just call for me. Wherever you are, I'll come running with the wind at my back.
Be right there.
What now?
Here to help!
